name: All Ages Fair Isle Love Beanie
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

Now you can make this award winning beanie!

The Fair Isle Love beanie was the 1st place winner for Small Accessories at the 2013 CGOA Conference in Charlotte/Concord, NC.

This beanie might look difficult with its intricate color changes, but the yarn does all the work! 

Using self-striping yarn, and a solid color you can whip up this beanie in no time. Use white to make the colors pop, or grey for a more muted look.

Fair Isle is a technique where two colors are used in any particular row to create pictures or designs in your project. 

Don't know how to do Fair Isle? Don't worry, there is an extensive photo tutorial section (13 pages!!!) that will not only teach you how to create Fair Isle but also covers all of this:

1. Color Changing throughout the beanie including at the round join.
2.  Catching the yarn to create short floats.
3. How to keep your yarn untangled.
4. Photo tutorial of stitches used on beanie brim.
5. How to keep your seam straight on your beanie.
6. How to make a magic adjustable loop.

I also have video tutorials for all the techniques on the website. 

The beanie includes full written instructions as well as a color chart for the Fair Isle portion.

The beanie is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

Once payment clears, you will receive an email with an instant download link.

name: Reversible Trio of Forest Baskets
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

These reversible baskets are a great way to try out Fair Isle Crochet. Using medium worsted weight yarn, you can start with the small leaf basket to get your feet wet and eventually move on to the large owl basket when you're ready.

Not only are these baskets cute, but they are practical. You can reverse from pattern to a solid color by simply flipping them inside out.

Never tried Fair Isle Crochet? Don't worry, the pattern comes with a photo tutorial section and you can watch my free video tutorials on the subject whenever you like.

Fair Isle is a technique where two colors are used in any particular row to create pictures or designs in your project. 
The photo tutorials include:

1. Color Changing throughout the beanie including at the round join.
2. Catching the yarn to create short floats.
3. How to keep your yarn untangled.
5. How to keep your seam straight on your basket.

Basket Sizes:
Owl Basket: 24” circumference x 8” high
Tree Basket: 15” circumference x 4” high
Leaf Basket: 10” circumference x 2” high

name: All Ages Mix Tape Beanie
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

What's better than an 80's perm? Something to cover it -- like this Mix Tape Beanie! 

If you miss your badly recorded radio mix tapes with the DJ talking over the first 10 seconds of the each song, then get your fix by making this super fun slightly slouchy beanie.

Using the Fair Isle technique this beanie will fit all ages and can be made in all colors. The ones pictured are just a touch of the combinations you can create.

Fair Isle is a technique where two colors are used in any particular row to create pictures or designs in your project. Don't know how to do Fair Isle? Don't worry, there is an extensive photo tutorial section (13 pages!!!) that will not only teach you how to create Fair Isle but also covers all of this:

1. Color Changing throughout the beanie including at the round join.
2.  Catching the yarn to create short floats.
3. How to keep your yarn untangled.
4. Photo tutorial of stitches used on beanie brim.
5. How to keep your seam straight on your beanie.
6. How to make a magic adjustable loop.

The beanie includes full written instructions as well as a color chart for the Fair Isle portion.

The beanie is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

Once payment clears, you will receive an email with an instant download link.

name: Owl Basket
description:
Skill Level: Easy

This monochromatic owl basket is simple and chic with a twist. It's generous size (28 inches around by 12 inches high) can hold three full size rolled up towels. But don't stop there! Use it to hold toys in the kid's room, or odds and ends in the living room. Using thick yarn it is sturdy and can stand up on it's own, yet can collapse flat when not needed. 

Recommended Yarn 
6 - Super Bulky

Recommended Hook 
10mm [US-P]

The basket is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

name: SubLIME Scarf and Wrist Warmers Pattern Pack
description:
Skill Level: Easy

The necklace scarf and wrist warmers are made from lace weight yarn which make it a great project for warm summer months, both to crochet and to wear!

Using super simple stitches even beginners can make these up easily. The wrist warmers fit most women, but I give instructions on how you can increase the circumference.

Recommended Yarn 
2 - Lace

Recommended Hook 
3.5mm [US-E]

description:
Skill Level: Easy

This tree of love afghan represents a family tree that continually grows with the passage of time and growth of love. Either made for a newlywed couple or a new addition to the family, this afghan can be passed down through the ages as the family tree grows. 

This beautiful afghan is the perfect size to fit the crib of a precious little one or rest on the couch or chair of a new couple. Made with single crochet and bobbles, this blanket is easy to work up.

name: Seat Belt Travel Pillow
description:
Skill Level: Easy

Finally a comfortable travel pillow for those long road trips we all take.

After trying everything to keep my daughter’s head out of her stomach when sleeping on road trips, I finally decided to make something myself and this travel pillow is what I came up with. Made with only 1 skein of 100% cotton yarn this pillow is soft and cool on the skin, and cheap to make.

The pillow has three straps to attach to a shoulder seat belt to keep it from falling down once you (yes it can be used for adults) or your little one falls asleep. The contoured “chin catcher” helps keep your head from falling forward and the long length lets you hold on to it (finally something to do with your arms when sleeping in the car).

This pillow is intended for children over 3 years old due to the buttons and because it can only be used with the shoulder strap of your car (booster seats and up).

Recommended Yarn
4 - Medium
 
Recommended Hook
5.0mm [US-H]

The pillow is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

Once payment clears, you will receive an email with an instant download link.

description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

This heirloom teddy is the perfect gift for a new child or for the child in all of us. This bear is great for boys or girls and can be dressed up anyway you like making it very versatile.

This cutie is jointed so Teddy can be played with and displayed in a variety of ways. The jointing  is a very easy process explained in the pattern with no extra tools necessary.

Made with Bulky yarn this bear works up quickly. All you need is a knowledge of increasing and decreasing and you are ready to make one of your own.  

Recommended Yarn
5 - Bulky
 
Recommended Hook
5.5mm [US-I]

Finished Measurements
15" tall

The ami is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

name: Special Yarn Scarf
description:
Skill Level: Easy

Ever purchase a skein of yarn that you loved the look of but had no idea what  to make with it? Afraid the beautiful spinning or unique texture would be lost when crocheted? Well I have the perfect pattern to keep the look of your specialty yarn.

This very easy scarf uses a lace weight yarn casing to let your special yarn shine through. Either choose a coordinating shade to blend in with your specialty yarn, or a contrasting yarn to add a whole new dimension to the fiber.

The fringe is created while working the scarf so there is nothing to add later and you have two options for letting it hang, either looped or loose. 

A photo tutorial is included on how to work the two yarns together.  

Recommended Yarn
0 - Lace
5 - Bulky
 
Recommended Hook
6.0mm [US-J]
 
Finished Measurements
8" across x 64" long (not including fringe)

The scarf is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

Wonderfully Horrific Crochet is an eBook containing 14 patterns of classic horror film images.

From Frankenstein and Dracula to the classic poison apple, this book is sure to have something that will make you shriek!

The book contains 14 fantastic patterns as well as a supplies section and a tutorial section for all the stitches and techniques contained in the book.

name: Roly Poly Piggy Amigurumi
description:
Skill Level: Easy

This cute little piggy is part of the Roly Poly Family. He is the perfect beginner project for someone wanting to try amigurumi crocheting, and would make a great gift for any animal lover.

Using basic stitches and minimal shaping (increasing and decreasing is all you need to know), you can easily crochet this little guy up in one evening. This piggy is a great starter amigurumi because it works from basic shapes to create a cute finished product. Be sure to check out the other animals in the collection and crochet up a whole menagerie in a weekend.

name: Over the Shoe Little Girl's Leg Warmer
description:
Skill Level: Easy

These cute leg warmers are great for a dancer, or the perfect accessory to all the popular tights that are out there these days. name: One Skein Mobius Cowl
description:
Skill Level: Easy

A mobius strip is a continuous piece of fabric or paper with only one side. This no seam mobius cowl has pictures to demonstrate how to make the mobius effect to make this project super easy. It also gives an alternate pattern to make a different look to your cowl.

Made with bulky yarn, this pattern works up in an afternoon and is a great project for on the go.

Cowls are a great alternative to scarves. Just place over your head and you won’t have to fuss with it for the rest of the day.

name: One Skein Cowl eBook
description:

This is a complilation of all of my one skein cowl designs.

In this ebook you will get the following 8 patterns:

One Skein Arches Cowl
One Skein Billow Cowl
One Skein Buttoned Cowl

name: Nob Hill Beret
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

The Nob Hill beret is made with deceptively easy stitches. The pattern gives a dense weave that keeps the chill out, and looks great in any color you choose. 

This is a true beret that lays flat when not being worn. It will fit most women (head circumference is 20" at opening). This can be modified by using either larger or smaller yarn and hooks to achieve other sizes.

Recommended Yarn
5 - Bulky
 
Recommended Hook
8.0mm [US-L]
 
Stitch Diagram?
Yes
 
Finished Measurements
approx. 20" circumference at opening

The beret is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

name: All Ages Nautical Nights Beanie
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

Any nautical fan will love this homage to the sea. 

Using the Fair Isle technique this beanie will fit all ages and can be made in all colors

Fair Isle is a technique where two colors are used in any particular row to create pictures or designs in your project. Don't know how to do Fair Isle? Don't worry, there is an extensive photo tutorial section (13 pages!!!) that will not only teach you how to create Fair Isle but also covers all of this:

1. Color Changing throughout the beanie including at the round join.
2.  Catching the yarn to create short floats.
3. How to keep your yarn untangled.
4. Photo tutorial of stitches used on beanie brim.
5. How to keep your seam straight on your beanie.
6. How to make a magic adjustable loop.

Recommended Yarn
3 - Light
 
Recommended Hook
3.5mm [US-E]
4.0mm [US-G]
2.5mm [US-C]
3.25mm [US-D]
 
Finished Measurements
Sizes Included are:
Baby: 15" circumference
Child: 17" circumference
Woman: 20" circumference
Man: 22" circumference

The beanie is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

Once payment clears, you will receive an email with an instant download link.

name: Mac and Tosh Apple Ami with Removable Worm Friend
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

Mac and Tosh are roommates. Sure, Mac is the home and Tosh is living inside him, but they like each other and don’t mind the living arrangements. Tosh easily comes in and out of his hole to play with Mac and anyone else who is game.

Mac is a true to scale apple amigurumi standing at approx. 3.5 inches tall. The pattern gives detailed instructions (with pictures) on how to create Tosh’s worm home inside the apple. Plus there is instruction on a plain apple if you would like to create one without the hole.

Recommended Yarn
4 - Medium
 
Recommended Hook
3.5mm [US-E]

Finished Measurements
3.5" tall

The ami is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

name: Hootie Who Owl Ornament
description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

I've loved owls ever since my great grandpa's macramé owl he kept in his living room. 

In honor of that hanging owl, I have created my own. These cute little hanging owls are great for decorating just about anything. Trees, purses, backpacks, the places you can put these are endless. With basic increases and decreases you can make one of these up super quick.

But don't stop at making small ornaments, change to a bigger yarn and hook and make a full size stuffed animal. Make a bunch to decorate your kid's bed. It's such an easy pattern that you can make them for everyone.

The pattern gives you instruction on how to create the single color owl and then gives you color change information for the monochromatic owl and striped owl (all pictured).

Recommended Yarn
2 - Fine
3 - Light
 
Recommended Hook
2.5mm [US-C]
 
Finished Measurements
2.5" x 2.5"

The owl is in .pdf format, you will need Adobe Reader to view and print it.

name: Golden Gate Necklace Scarf
description:
Skill Level: Easy

Named after the famous bridge in San Francisco, the strands of this necklace scarf remind me of the suspension cables on that national monument. 

This scarf is a great last minute gift option. Super easy stitches with 4 strands of bulky yarn held together make this cute accessory easy and fast to work up. 

The removable flowers can be made in any color and moved around to give the necklace scarf an infinite number of design possibilities. The free flowing strands can be manipulated to create even more choices. 

Stitch diagram for flower included.

5 - Bulky
 
Recommended Hook
8.0mm [US-L]

Yes

description:
Skill Level: Intermediate

Pattern Includes:

Girl Doll (with undergarments)

Princess Dress

Poncho and Capri Set

Mermaid Costume

I have decided not to name this doll because we want you to make her your own. Straight hair, curly hair, brown hair, blonde hair, pale skin or dark skin, you can customize this doll to resemble anyone you like. I give you the directions and you choose the colors. I have listed the yarn used for this doll in case you love her so much you need one of your own. I also give suggestions for good yarn for skin types in the pattern so you can find the look you want to achieve.

I also have included a tutorial on how to make curly hair out of yarn. Yes, the yarn on this doll’s head was made completely by me (well at least the curly part) and it is not hard at all. You will also receive the pattern for the underwear and camisole.

4 - Medium

18" tall

I include a picture tutorial oh how to create the spiral effect so you don’t have to rely on just the written pattern.

name: Crunch Leg Warmers
description:
Skill Level: Easy

These cute leg warmers are the perfect accessory to all the popular tights that are out there these days. This pattern comes in a small, medium and large size that will fit just about any women’s legs(see below for exact measurements on sizes), but there are also simple instructions on how to size these to your exact needs. You could even make them for young girls. These are so simple to make and take only a few hours, you can make some in every color of your wardrobe.

The pictures show how the leg warmers can be worn on the ankle or arch of the foot. The bottom of these legwarmers do not stretch so they will stay put on the arch and not ride up.

Recommended Yarn
 4 - Medium

 
Recommended Hook
 5.0mm [US-H]

 
Stitch Diagram?
 Yes

 
Finished Measurements

Small = 10” cuff (not stretched), 15” cuff (stretched) x 16” length. Bottom cuff is 10” and not meant to stretch so it will sit in the arch of your foot without moving up.

Medium = 12” cuff (not stretched), 18” cuff (stretched) x 16” length. Bottom cuff is 12” and not meant to stretch so it will sit in the arch of your foot without moving up.

Large = 14” cuff (not stretched), 20” cuff (stretched) x 16” length. Bottom cuff is 14” and not meant to stretch so it will sit in the arch of your foot without moving up.
